HEADLINE: Haxejs, Angularjs Ecosystem Hub
HOME_TITLE: Born for large scale cross-platform app
HOME_TEXT: Haxejs helps developers from all platforms build complex, high performance client apps for the modern web and mobile devices.
GETSTARTED_TEXT: How to setup and use Haxejs, basic templates and examples, and more.
UNDERSTAND_TEXT: Haxejs helps you write cross-platform complex app in OOP and DI way
SHOWCASE_TEXT: More and more apps built by haxejs framework
SHOWCASE_INTRO1: This site itself is written by haxejs,and it can run in mobile browsers
SHOWCASE_INTRO2: ListenMore2ImproveEnglish, a video/audio podcast app leads you improve english
SHOWCASE_INTRO3: Photo Essays, a news app tells hotest stories in pictures
BEIAN: We believe in Open source and Internet.
HOME_FEATURE1_TITLE: Cross-platform hybrid mobile apps with Ionic and Cordova
HOME_FEATURE1_TEXT: Create hybrid mobile apps with the web technologies you love. Develop once, deploy everywhere.
HOME_FEATURE2_TEXT: Use modern, high level, strictly typed programming language Haxe(very similar to Java) to generate elegant javascript, it provides compiler error check and code completions with many IDE tools.
HOME_FEATURE3_TITLE: Powerful with angularjs, and other directives, services
HOME_FEATURE3_TEXT: Angularjs is elegant and well designed, and it is the core of haxejs framework, many good javascript libraries are rewritten in angularjs way, and integrated seamlessly.
HOME_FEATURE4_TEXT: Best Practices, Lessons, Tricks are distilled and enforced in the libraries or project templates. They are reusable and very valuable.
HOME_FEATURE5_TEXT: Hundreds of haxe libraries are easy to put under your fingers, give you lots of choices.
HOME_FEATURE6_TEXT: All javascript libraries your code needs can be embeded to a single js file or copied to a special place automatically so they will not bother you from now on.
